5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Aishah said:“The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to say Taslim after every two Rak’ah, and he would perform Witr with one Rak’ah.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ بِرَكْعَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Praying one Rak’ah for Witr
